dc_title_s: Ad antiquam Indiæ geographiam tabula : auctor d'Anville
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:11,000,000]. Inset map:"Ptolemaicæ tabulæ (in parte maritima) brevis imago." Numbered 33. Shows rivers and settlements. Published by Harrison as part of an apparently untitled general atlas. Relief shown pictorially. Ferro meridian.|43 x 38 centimeters|Scale [1:11,000,000]|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
